BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.delay#
BlackBox.type:
delay#
  :: ( KnownDomain dom        -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom                -- ARG[2]
  -> Enable dom               -- ARG[3]
  -> a                        -- ARG[4]
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[5]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.asyncRegister#
BlackBox.type:
asyncRegister#
  :: ( KnownDomain dom        -- ARG[0]
     , NFDataX a )            -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom                -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset dom                -- ARG[3]
  -> Enable dom               -- ARG[4]
  -> a                        -- ARG[5] (powerup value)
  -> a                        -- ARG[6] (reset value)
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[7]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.register#
BlackBox.type:
register#
  :: ( KnownDomain dom        -- ARG[0]
     , Undefined a )          -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom                -- ARG[2]
  -> Reset dom                -- ARG[3]
  -> Enable dom               -- ARG[4]
  -> a                        -- ARG[5] (powerup value)
  -> a                        -- ARG[6] (reset value)
  -> Signal clk a             -- ARG[7]
  -> Signal clk a

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.clockGen
BlackBox.type:
clockGen
  :: KnownDomain dom     -- ARG[0]
  => Clock dom

BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.Testbench.tbClockGen
BlackBox.type:
tbClockGen
  :: KnownDomain dom     -- ARG[0]
  => Signal dom Bool      -- ARG[1]
  -> Clock dom

BlackBox.name: Clash.Signal.Internal.resetGenN
BlackBox.type: resetGenN :: (KnownDomain dom, 1 <= n) => SNat n -> Reset dom
